title.rendered: Saratoga Springs High School Cafeteria Earns National Design Award

content.rendered:
The newly renovated Saratoga Springs High School cafeteria has been nationally recognized for its innovative design, earning a spot in the 2025 Foodservice Consultants Society International (FCSI) Project Showcase. Completed in January 2024, the updated space enhances the dining experience for students, making it more inviting, efficient, and modern.

Designed by Mosaic Associates, the project transformed the cafeteria into a more functional and welcoming environment. This prestigious recognition highlights the district’s commitment to creating functional and welcoming environments that support student well-being. The redesigned cafeteria features improved seating, enhanced flow for food service, and an overall more engaging atmosphere for students and staff to enjoy.
